incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the <pay> and <pay> agent assist issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with our Billing processor. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Increased Rate of 500 Errors for Twilio Programmable Messaging API

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging API was degraded between 02:09 to 02:11 Pacific Time on 02/08/2024 and 18:06 to 18:08 Pacific Time on 04/08/2024. During this period, customers may have experienced increased latencies and 500 errors. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with AWS Increased rate of 500 errors for Twilio Programmable Messaging API. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Real time Usage and Billing data is delayed

incident_updates.body: The issue with Programmable Wireless and Super SIM where customers are not able see amounts billed for data usage when viewing Usage in Console or via the UsageRecords APIs has been resolved and it is operating normally at this time.

We have addressed the issue with Programmable Wireless and Super SIM where customers are not able see amounts billed for data usage when viewing Usage in Console or via the UsageRecords APIs. The amounts billed will be updated once the incident is resolved and delayed records are processed. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or sooner once more information becomes available.

We continue to experience issue with Programmable Wireless and Super SIM where customers are not able see amounts billed for data usage when viewing Usage in Console or via the UsageRecords APIs. There are no delays in reporting the amount of bytes used by these SIMs. The amounts billed will be updated once the incident is resolved and delayed records are processed. Our engineering team is actively working on to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have become aware of a potential issue with Super SIM billing and usage data availability in real time. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Super SIM billing enrichment. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Encountering 5xx Errors for Voice

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice and Flex was degraded for 6 minutes between 1:35 PM and 1:41 PM Pacific Time on 08/06/2026.
